edu.cwru.sepia.model

Class ConflictTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest

  • public class ConflictTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains tests based on known action conflicts.
    Author:
    The Condor

      • shootAndKillWhileMovingAway

        public void shootAndKillWhileMovingAway()
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where one unit moves out of range as the other tries to attack it. Expect both to succeed.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        org.json.JSONException

      • shootAndKillWhileMovingAwayButStillBlockOtherMove

        public void shootAndKillWhileMovingAwayButStillBlockOtherMove()
                                                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                              org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where two units are on a collision course, but one will be shot dead. Also, the unit that will be dead is moving away from the shooter, such that it will be out of range. Expect the attack to succeed, but the two moves to make each other fail.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        org.json.JSONException

      • moveToVacatingSpot

        public void moveToVacatingSpot()
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where a unit moves to a place with a unit that will move out of the way. Expect the moving in unit to fail and the moving out unit to succeed.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • moveToSpotOfDeadGuy

        public void moveToSpotOfDeadGuy()
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where a unit is trying to move into a space containing a unit that is about to die. Expect the attack that kills the unit to succeed, the stationary unit to not try anything, and the moving unit to fail.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • moveToSpotOfExhaustingResource

        public void moveToSpotOfExhaustingResource()
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                           org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where a unit is trying to move into a space containing a node that is about to be exhausted. Expect the gather that exhausts the resource to succeed, and the moving unit to fail.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • oneGatherTooMuch

        public void oneGatherTooMuch()
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             org.json.JSONException
        Test one unit gathering more than exists in a node. Expected to succeed.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • twoGather

        public void twoGather(edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount amount)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      org.json.JSONException
        Test two units gathering from the same node. Expected to succeed when there is more than attempt or equal to attempt, and fail in both cases where there is less.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • threeGather

        public void threeGather(edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount amount)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        org.json.JSONException
        Test three units gathering from the same node. Important because a third should not make others succeed. Expected to succeed when there is more than attempt or equal to attempt, and fail in both cases where there is less.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • ProduceRoomLeft

        public void ProduceRoomLeft()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where you try to produce with two units and there is no room left. Expect both to fail.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • NProduceMRoomLeft

        public void NProduceMRoomLeft(int n,
                     int m,
                     edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount amount)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where there is one tile left and two are trying to fill it. Do this by filling n tiles with town halls to make peasants and all but m of the rest with farms, so there is ample food. Expect m to succeed, n-m to fail. This should draw resources for m of them. When you lack sufficient resources, all should fail.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • TwoProduceNoRoomLeftBecauseMove

        public void TwoProduceNoRoomLeftBecauseMove()
        Test the situation where there is no move left because the last space is being moved into.

      • TwoProduceOneRoomLeftBecauseMove

        public void TwoProduceOneRoomLeftBecauseMove()
        Test the situation where there is one room left after the spaces claimed by move

      • productionSituations

        public void productionSituations()
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
        Test a series of situations where the amount of resources left are in various amounts. Expect that whenever any resource is overdrawn, everything that takes that resource fails, but things that don't take that resource should not fail unless that fails another resource. Expect that resources are altered for successful actions. Also expect that resources are not subtracted for failed actions.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • productionSituations

        public void productionSituations(int numnone,
                        int numwoodonly,
                        int numfoodonly,
                        int numgoldonly,
                        int numgoldandfood,
                        int numwoodandfood,
                        int numgoldandwood,
                        int numgoldwoodandfood,
                        edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount goldamount,
                        edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount woodamount,
                        edu.cwru.sepia.model.ConflictTest.Amount foodamount)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        org.json.JSONException

      • produceUpgradesInLimitedSpaceSituation

        public void produceUpgradesInLimitedSpaceSituation()

      • productionSituationsWithPartialRoom

        public void productionSituationsWithPartialRoom()
        Test a series of situations where the amount of resources left are in various amounts and some of them fail. Expect that whenever any resource is overdrawn, everything that takes that resource fails, but things that don't take that resource should not fail unless that fails another resource. Expect that no resources are drawn when things fail due to non-placement.

      • productionGather

        public void productionGather()
        Test a situation for each resource (food, wood, gold) where a farm is built or a unit deposits resources at the same time as a production action. Expect the production to always fail.

      • overKill

        public void overKill()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where two units each shoot the same unit, which would be killed by either individually. Both should succeed and the unit should be dead.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • mutualKill

        public void mutualKill()
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       org.json.JSONException
        Test the situation where two units each shoot each other, both weak enough to die. Both should succeed and both should die.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
